cab.content: Military Secret.1002is ihe'Pi':wen-it^ 7)^JI i^rom Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India. m/j ' 18ft July 1919.?g^f (Received 19th.) '9751. 18th July. 68. Our telegram of the 18th instant, 9730, takes place of usual daily Part I. and Part II. situation reports. Only general account of action in Zhob is being communicated to Press, pending the receipt of full report from General, Baluchistan.
